title: 12th June 1942: Anne Frank receives her famous diary as a thirteenth birthday present from her father
itunes:summary: Over three volumes Anne Frank recorded the relationships between the Frank family, the Van Pels family, and her father’s friend Fritz Pfeffer with whom they shared a confined hiding place in the 'Secret Annexe' above her father's warehouse ...
dc:creator: History Pod
